imdb_user_reviews.contents: MUCH better than some would have you believe
'Its important to enjoy life while you still can!'
Red2 is Red2.DO Not Expect  The Original RED
Its important to enjoy life while you still can!
Failed to Live Up to the Hype and Level of the First Movie
A Sequel that Keeps the Level of the First Movie
Sorry Bruce, not even you can save this incoherent garbage.
Enjoyable action flick taking the good from the first
Much better than the first one! Can't wait for part 3!
An excellent action packed fun movie!
Red 2 is Action Packed and Full of Laughs!!!
Red was awesome, Red 2 tops it off...
Not as good as the first
Not as good as the first one, but still entertaining enough
Big adventure than the first and entertains very well
Better done than the first, but less funny
Hopkins is star of the show.
Red 2: Not As God As Red
"Its important to enjoy life while you still can"
Slightly weaker than the first film, but it still has enough humour and action to keep fans of the first film and of the genre as a whole happy
More of the same thank you and roll on red 3
At the very least, as Good as the first!
good action...good fun...as good or better then the first
Buckle up! Red 2 is every bit as fun as the first.
Retired ex-agents unite to recover a missing nuclear device that holds the fate of the world.
It doesn't have the pizazz of the of the original, but it is entertaining
You're never too old to save the world
Funny Humor! Cool Action! Sizzling Chemistry! Great Movie!
Returning to the formula of witty banter and over-the-top action, this reunion of aging spies back in action is still plenty of escapist fun
Red 2 - Action And Humor, Doesn't Get Any Better Than This!
Red 2 Somewhat manages to stand in its place but not able to stand with the original!!!.
Older bad-asses kicking butt is quite entertaining
A lot better than you might think although it doesn't do anything brave
"Two shots, here, and here. Drag the body in there and repeat as necessary."
True to the original -- a perfectly watchable action comedy
Some guys just can't seem to retire
Some more fun and some more funny
funnier and more exciting than the first
good, not great. Not a re-do
While it wasn't all that terrible it just didn't have the same feel of the first one, but not unexpected. Most sequels are that way.
"Red 2" is More of the Same Fun Action Hijinks
Not Quite As Red As the First.
A Failed Parody of a Parody of a Spoof of a Spy Movie--because it's just not funny
Loads of action and amusing in some parts. 4/10
Better than the first one!!!! All the way!!!
Contrary to many online negative reviews, I thought that the movie was pretty good and hilarious.
A little smarter, a little sharper and still a lot of fun
Grander and funnier than the first one
Great way to spend a couple of hours
Best Comedy I've seen this year
Forget the plot, we're all having fun
I got plenty of enjoyment out of the sequel to Red, Red 2, what with all that action and humor that abounded
Has fun as the first one.
By-the-numbers sequel to what could've been an engaging franchise
Not as good as the first, but entertaining
Much better than the rating implies
one of the best action comedy franchises
A Summer Hit For Sure A Classic For Years To Come.
One of the Few Sequels that Tops the Original
Great, suspenseful, good showpiece for the actors as well
if you are looking for some comedy and action
Not as good as the first. But still a fun comic book movie.
Entertaining in the Same Way as the First
Script is woeful, the action is good
Great action-comedy! A very entertaining movie.
"RED 2" is large amounts of fun whether it be intelligent or not. An enjoyable sequel that doesn't try too hard; but ends up delivering a satisfying piece of film.
Gallantry, little blood in spite of a high body count and wonderful actors. Enjoyed it!
A Fun Action Comedy-Drama Adventure Thriller
Funnier if you have seen RED
A poor attempt at a sequel

good balance of everything and very unexpected
